nodes.documentation: @dev No params nor returns. This is here just in case no functions are called

devdoc.details: All function calls are currently implement without side effects

addCook(address).return: success true if the address was promoted to the new role

addOwner(address).return: success true if the address was promoted to the new role

addWaiter(address).return: success true if the address was promoted to the new role

cookFinish(uint256).return: success true if the order change succeeded

cookStart(uint256).return: success true if the order change succeeded

customerGetOpenOrders(uint256).return: qty The number of orders that the customer has under thier address

customerSubmitOrder(uint256,uint256,uint.return: orderID The ID of the order placed

destroyContract().details: Any user in the owners map can destroy

getCook(address).return: success true if address is a member of cooks

getMenu(uint256).return: cost of the item at index requested

getOpenOrders(uint256).return: state The state of the order. 0:Ordered 1:Approved 2:Cooking 3:Ready 4:Delivered

getOrderStatus(uint256).return: state The state of the order. 0:Ordered 1:Approved 2:Cooking 3:Ready 4:Delivered

getOwner(address).return: success true if address is a member of owners

getWaiter(address).return: success true if address is a member of waiters

removeCook(address).return: success true if the address was removed from the role

removeOwner(address).return: success true if the address was removed from the role

removeWaiter(address).return: success true if the address was removed from the role

waiterApprove(uint256).return: success true if the order change succeeded

waiterDeliver(uint256).return: success true if the order change succeeded

withdraw(uint256).return: success true if address is a member of waiters

disableBreaker().notice: Disable circuit breaker and prevent any additional orders from being placed

enableBreaker().notice: Enable circuit breaker and prevent any additional orders from being placed
